name: is213-microservice-sms
description: ##### *-** Plan **-* 1. NodeJS & NPM 2. Typescript 3. Twilio 4. Dockerize with Docker 5. dotenv dependency 6. get authentication id & token & twilio "from" number from .env 7. get user's "to" number from user info microservice 8. get sms "body" content from booked slot / updated test result microservices 9. steps 7 & 8 should be updated to use AMQP with RabbitMQ (use amqplib from amqp.node)
